juzs.text: 78|1|[Kofiron] Dar ʙorai ci ciz az jakdigar suol mekunand
78|2|Az xaʙare ʙuzurg
78|3|Hamon [xaʙare] ki onho dar on ixtilof dorand
78|4|Cunin nest [ki onho meandesand] ʙa zudi xohand donist
78|5|Boz ham cunin nest; ʙa zudi xohand donist
78|6|Ojo zaminro ʙistare [ʙaroi osoisi sumo] qaror nadodem
78|7|Va kuhhoro mexho [-i on] qaror nadodem
78|8|Va sumoro cuft [naru moda] ofaridem
78|9|Va xoʙi sumoro [mojai] oromisaton qaror dodem
78|10|Va saʙro pusise [ʙarojaton] qaror dodem
78|11|Va ruzro [vasilai] zindagi va [kasʙi maos] qaror dodem
78|12|Va ʙar farozi sumo haft [osmon] muhkam ʙino kardem
78|13|Va [xursedro] caroƣe duraxson ofaridem
78|14|Va az aʙrhoi ʙoronzo oʙe farovon furu firistodem
78|15|To ʙad-on dona va gijoh ʙisjor ʙirujonem
78|16|Va ʙoƣhoe purdaraxt [ʙo on parvaris dihem]
78|17|Be gumon, ruzi dovari va'dagoh [-i Mo ʙo sumo] ast
78|18|Ruze, ki dar «sur» damida mesavad va sumo guruh-guruh [ʙa mahsar] meoed
78|19|Va osmon kusuda mesavad va ʙa surati darhoi mutaaddid darmeojad
78|20|Va kuhho ʙa harakat darmeojad va ʙa surati saroʙe mesavad
78|21|Va ʙe gumon, cahannam kamingohest
78|22|Va mahalli ʙozgaste ʙaroi tuƣjongaron
78|23|Muddati zamone daroz dar on co ʙimonand
78|24|Dar on co [cizi] xunuke namecasand va na osomidani [-i guvoroe xohand dost]
78|25|Cuz oʙe suzon va [moe'e, ki] cirku xun [ast]
78|26|[In] Kajfare ast munosiʙ va darxur [-i a'molason]
78|27|Caro ki onho hec umede ʙa [ruzi] hisoʙ nadostand
78|28|Va ojoti Moro ʙa siddat takziʙ kardand
78|29|Va Mo hama cizro [dar Lavhi mahfuz] sumorisu saʙt kardaem
78|30|Pas, [kajfari a'moli xudro] ʙicased, ki cize cuz azoʙ ʙar sumo nameafzoem
78|31|Be gumon, ʙaroi parhezkoron komjoʙi [-i ʙuzurge] ast
78|32|Boƣhoi [meva] va tokzorho
78|33|Va hurone cavon va hamsinnusol
78|34|Va comhoe laʙrez va pajopaj [az saroʙi pokizai ʙihist]
78|35|Dar on co na suxani ʙehudae mesunavand va na duruƣe
78|36|[In] Podos az coniʙi Parvardigori tust va atoe az ruji hisoʙ
78|37|[Hamon] Parvardigori osmonho va zamin va on ci dar mijoni onhost; [hamon Allohi] Rahmon [ki] hec kas [dar on ruz] joroi suxan guftan ʙo uro nadorad
78|38|Ruze, ki ruh [Caʙrail] va faristagon ʙa saf ʙiistand, hec kas suxan nagujad, cuz kase, ki Allohi rahmon ʙa u icozat doda ʙosad va [u] suxani durust [va savoʙ] gujad
78|39|On [ruz] ruzi haq ast; pas, har ki xohad, rohi ʙozgaste ʙa sui Parvardigori xud ʙicujad

78|40|Ba rosti, Mo sumoro az azoʙe nazdik ʙim dodem: ruze, ki inson on ciro az qaʙl ʙo dasthoi xud firistodaast, meʙinad va kofir megujad: «Ej kos, man xok ʙudam [va ʙaroi hisoʙ ʙarangexta namesudam!»]
79|1|Savgand ʙa faristagone, ki con [-i kofiron]-ro ʙa siddat ʙerun mekasand
79|2|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki con [-i mu'minon]-ro ʙa narmi va osoni megirand
79|3|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki [ʙa amri Alloh taolo az osmon ʙa suji zamin] sinovarand
79|4|Va savgand ʙa faristagone, ki [dar icroi avomiri ilohi] ʙar jakdigar saʙqat megirand
79|5|Va savgand ʙa faristagone [ki ʙa amri ilohi] korhoro tadʙir mekunand
79|6|Ruze, ki [pas az avvalin damidan dar sur] zamin [va kuhho va hama ciz] ʙa larza darojad
79|7|[Va] Dar paji on [damidani duvumi hasr] ʙijojad
79|8|Dar on ruz dilhoe saxt muztariʙ [va tarson] ast
79|9|Va casmhoi onon [az tarsu sarmsori] furu aftodaast
79|10|[Kofiron dar dunjo] Megujand: «Ojo mo [pas az marg duʙora] ʙa holi avvali xud ʙozgardonda mesavem
79|11|Ojo hangome ki ustuxonhoi pusida sudem [va ʙa xok taʙdil gastem, ʙoz ham zinda mesavem]?»
79|12|Gujand: «[Agar cunin va'dae durust ʙosad] on goh on ʙozgaste zijonʙor ast»
79|13|Pas on [ʙozgast] tanho ʙo jak ʙongi ʙohajʙat ast
79|14|Va nogahon hamagi ʙar arsai zamin [-i mahsar] zohir] mesavand
79|15|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo dostoni Muso ʙa tu rasidaast
79|16|On goh ki Parvardigoras uro dar sarzamini muqaddasi «Tuvo» nido dod [va farmud]
79|17|«Ba sui Fir'avn ʙirav, ki u tuƣjon kardaast
79|18|Va ʙa u ʙigu: «Ojo mexohi [az kufru gunoh] pok savi
79|19|Va man turo ʙa suji Parvardigorat hidojat kunam, to [az U] ʙitarsi [va farmonʙardor savi]
79|20|Pas, [Muso] mu'cizai ʙuzurgro ʙa u nison dod
79|21|Ammo u takziʙu sarkasi kard
79|22|Sipas pust kard va ʙa kusisu talos [alajhi u] pardoxt
79|23|Pas, [qavmasro] cam' kardu nido dod
79|24|Va guft: «Man Parvardigori ʙartari sumo hastam»
79|25|Pas, Alloh taolo uro ʙa azoʙi oxirat va dunjo giriftor kard
79|26|Be gumon, dar in [voqea] ʙaroi har kas, ki [az Alloh taolo] metarsad, iʙrate hast
79|27|Ojo ofarinisi sumo [ʙa'd az marg] saxttar ast jo osmone, ki [Alloh taolo] onro ʙino kard
79|28|Saqfi onro ʙarafrostu ʙa on saklu nazm dod
79|29|Va saʙasro torik va ruzasro ravsan gardonid
79|30|Va zaminro ʙa'd az on gustaronid
79|31|Va az on oʙ [casmaho va cohho va] carogohasro ʙerun ovard
79|32|Va kuhhoro muhkam va ustuvor [ʙar ruji zamin] qaror dod
79|33|[Hamai inho] ʙaroi ʙahragirii sumo va cahorpojonaton ast
79|34|Pas, hangome ki [on] hodisai ʙuzurg [-i qijomat] faro rasad
79|35|Dar on ruz inson [tamomi a'molu] taloshoi xudro ʙa jod meovarad
79|36|Va cahannam ʙaroi har ʙinandae oskor mesavad
79|37|Pas, on kas, ki tuƣjon [va sarkasi] karda ʙosad
79|38|Va zindagii dunjoro [ʙar oxirat] tarceh doda ʙosad
79|39|Be tardid, cahannam cojgohi ust
79|40|Va ammo kase, ki az istodan dar huzuri Parvardigoras ʙimnok ʙuda va nafsro az havo [va havas] ʙozdosta ʙosad
79|41|Hatman, ʙihist cojgohi ust
79|42|[Ej Pajomʙar] Dar ʙorai qijomat az tu mepursand, ki dar ci zamone voqe' mesavad
79|43|Turo ʙo jodovarii in suxan ci kor ast
79|44|[Sarancom va] Muntahoi [ilmi] on nazdi Parvardigori tust
79|45|Tu, hatman, ʙimdihandai kasone hasti, ki az on metarsand
79|46|Ruze, ki [kofiron qijomatro] ʙuʙinand, [cunin ehsos mekunand, ki] gui [dar dunjo] cuz jak somgoh jo ʙomdod ʙa sar naʙurdaand
80|1|[Pajomʙar] cehra dar ham kasid va ruj ʙargardond
80|2|Az in ki on noʙino [Aʙdulloh iʙni Ummi Maktum] nazdas omad
80|3|Va [ej Pajomʙar] tu ci medoni? Ci ʙaso u [az gunohonas] pok savad
80|4|Jo pand girad va in pand ʙa sudas ʙosad
80|5|Ammo on ki [az imon] ʙenijozi mevarzad
80|6|Pas, tu ʙa u ru meovari
80|7|Dar hole ki agar u xudro [az kufr] pok nasozad, erode ʙar tu nest
80|8|Ammo kase, ki sitoʙon ʙa suroƣi tu meojad
80|9|Va [az Alloh taolo] metarsad
80|10|Pas, tu az u ƣofil mesavi [va ʙa digaron mepardozi]
80|11|Hargiz cunin nest; ʙe gumon, in [ojot ʙaroi] tazakkur va jodovari ast
80|12|Pas, har ki ʙixohad, az on pand girad
80|13|Dar sahifahoi arcmande [saʙt] ast
80|14|[Dar cojgohe] Balandpoja va pokiza [az palidi]
80|15|Dar dasti safiron [-i vahj] ast
80|16|[Ki] ʙuzurgvoru nakukorand
80|17|Marg ʙar inson [-i kofir, ki] ci qadar nosipos ast
80|18|[Alloh taolo] Uro az ci ciz ofaridaast
80|19|Uro az nutfa [-i nocize] ofarid va sipas mavzunas soxt
80|20|On goh rohro ʙarojas oson namud
80|21|On goh [pas az pojoni umr] uro mirond va dar qaʙr [pinhon] namud
80|22|Sipas har goh ʙixohad, uro [zinda mekunad va] ʙarmeangezad
80|23|Hargiz cunin nest [ki u mepindorad]. U hanuz on ciro, ki [Alloh taolo] farmon doda, ʙa coj naovardaast
80|24|Pas, inson ʙojad ʙa ƣizoi xes [va ofarinisi on] ʙingarad
80|25|Mo oʙi farovon [az osmon] furu rextem
80|26|Sipas zaminro az ham sikoftem
80|27|On goh dar on dona [-hoi farovon] rujonidem
80|28|Va anguru saʙzi [xurokii ʙisjor]
80|29|Va zajtunu naxl
80|30|Va ʙoƣhoe [anʙuh va] purdaraxt
80|31|Va [anvoi] meva va alaf [padid ovardem]
80|32|[Hamai inho] Baroi ʙahragirii sumo va cahorpojonaton ast
80|33|Pas, hangome ki [on] sadoi ʙohajʙati [-i qijomat] faro rasad
80|34|Ruze, ki inson az ʙarodaras megurezad
80|35|Va az modaras va az padaras
80|36|Va az zanas va pisaronas [niz megurezad]
80|37|Dar on ruz har kasro korest, ki uro ʙa xud masƣul medorad
80|38|Cehrahoe dar on ruz kusoda va ravsan ast
80|39|[Ba xotiri ne'matu rahmati Alloh taolo] xandonu sod ast
80|40|Va cehrahoe dar on ruz ƣuʙorolud ast
80|41|Sijohi [va toriki] onhoro pusonidaast
80|42|Inon hamon kofironi ʙadkirdorand
81|1|On goh ki xursed dar ham pecida [va torik] gardad
81|2|Va on goh ki sitoragon ʙefuruƣ savand
81|3|Va on goh ki kuhho ʙa harakat darojand
81|4|va on goh ki modasuturoni ʙordor raho savand
81|5|Va on goh ki hajvonoti vahsi [dar kanori inson] gird ovarda savand
81|6|Va on goh ki darjoho [cusonu] ʙarafruxta savand
81|7|Va on goh ki har kas ʙo hamsoni xud qarin gardad
81|8|Va on goh ki az duxtari zindaʙagursuda pursida savad
81|9|[Ki] Ba kadomin gunoh kusta sudaast
81|10|Va on goh ki nomaho [-i a'mol] kusoda savad
81|11|Va on goh ki parda az rui osmon ʙargirifta savad
81|12|Va on goh ki duzax afruxta [va su'lavar] gardad
81|13|Va on goh ki ʙihist [ʙaroi parhezkoron] nazdik ovarda savad
81|14|[Dar on hangom] Har kas xohad donist, ki ci cize [ʙaroi oxirati xud] omoda kardaast
81|15|Pas, savgand ʙa sitoragone, ki [ʙa cojgohi xud] ʙozmegardand
81|16|[Sitoʙon] Harakat mekunand [va az nazar] pinhon mesavand
81|17|Va savgand ʙa saʙ, hangome ki [torikias kosta savad va] pust kunad
81|18|Va savgand ʙa suʙh, hangome ki ʙidamad
81|19|Be tardid, in [Qur'on suxani Alloh taolo ast, ki iʙloƣas ʙa Pajomʙar ʙa uhdai] firistodai ʙuzurgvor [Caʙrail] ast
81|20|[Hamon faristae] Ki [muqtadir va] nerumand ast va nazdi [Allohi] sohiʙi Ars maqomi voloe dorad
81|21|[Dar malakuti a'lo va olami faristagon] Az u farmon meʙarand va amin [-i vahj] ast
81|22|[Ej mardum] Hamnisini sumo [Muhammad] devona nest
81|23|Va ʙe tardid, [Muhammad] u [Caʙrail]-ro dar ufuqi ravsan didaast
81|24|Va u ʙar [iʙloƣi on ci az tariqi] ƣajʙ [ʙa vaj vahj megardad] ʙaxil nest
81|25|Va in [Qur'on] guftai sajtoni rondasuda nest
81|26|Pas, ʙa kuco meraved
81|27|In [Qur'on] cuz pand ʙaroi cahonijon [inson va cin] nest
81|28|Baroi har jak az sumo, ki ʙixohad rohi rosti [haqro] dar pes girad
81|29|Va sumo [cizero] namexohed, magar on ki Parvardigori cahonijon [iroda kunad va] ʙixohad
82|1|On goh ki osmon sikofta savad
82|2|On goh ki sitoragon parokanda savand [va furu rezand]
82|3|Va on goh ki darjoho [ʙa ham omezand va] ravon gardand
82|4|Va on goh ki qaʙrho zeru ru savad
82|5|[Dar on hangom] Har kas medonad, ci cizhoero pesopes firistoda va ci cizhoero vopas nihoda [va ʙar coj guzostaast]
82|6|Ej inson, ci cize turo [nisʙat] ʙa Parvardigori karimat maƣrur soxtaast
82|7|On [Parvardigore], ki turo ofarid va sipas saru somonat dod va on goh mutaodil va munosiʙat kardaast
82|8|Va ʙa har sakle [va surate], ki xost, turo tarkiʙ namud
82|9|Hargiz cunin nest [ki sumo gumon mekuned]; ʙalki sumo ruzi cazoro takziʙ mekuned
82|10|Va ʙe gumon, nigohʙonone [az faristagon] ʙar sumo gumorida sudaand
82|11|Ki navisandagone ʙuzurgvorand
82|12|On ciro ancom medihed, medonand [va a'moli neku ʙadi sumoro saʙt mekunand]
82|13|Musallaman, nakukoron dar ne'mat [-hoi ʙihist] hastand
82|14|Va jaqinan ʙadkoron dar [otasi] cahannamand
82|15|Ruzi cazo ʙa on darojand [va ʙisuzand]
82|16|Va hargiz onon az on co ʙa dur va [dar amon] naʙosand
82|17|Va tu ci doni, ki ruzi cazo cist
82|18|Boz tu ci medoni, ki ruzi cazo cist
82|19|Ruze, ki hec kas qodir ʙa ancomi kore ʙaroi digare nest; va dar on ruzi hukm [va farmon] az oni Alloh taolo ast
83|1|Voj ʙar kamfuruson
83|2|Kasone, ki cun [ʙaroi xud] az mardum pajmona mekunand, haqqi xudro komil megirand
83|3|Va hangome ki [mexohand] ʙaroi onon pajmona jo vazn kunand, kam meguzorand
83|4|Ojo onho gumon namekunand, ki [qijomat faro merasad va az qaʙrho] ʙarangexta mesavand
83|5|Dar ruze ʙuzurg
83|6|[Hamon] Ruze, ki mardum dar pesgohi Parvardigori cahonijon meistand
83|7|Hargiz cunin nest [ki kofiron pindostaand]! Ba rosti, ki nomai [a'moli] ʙadkoron dar siccin ast
83|8|Va tu ci doni, ki siccin cist
83|9|Kitoʙest, ki [a'moli ʙadkoron dar on] navista sudaast
83|10|Dar on ruz voj ʙar takziʙkunandagon
83|11|Onon, ki ruzi cazoro [inkor va] takziʙ mekunand
83|12|Va cuz sitamkoroni gunahkor [kase] on [ruz]-ro takziʙ namekunad
83|13|Hangome ki ojoti Mo ʙar u tilovat savad, gujad: «[In] Afsonahoi guzastagon ast»
83|14|Hargiz cunin nest [ki onho gumon mekunand]; ʙalki [ʙa saʙaʙi] on ci kardaand, ʙar dilhojason zangor ʙastaast
83|15|Hargiz cunin nest [ki onho mepindorand]. Be gumon, onon dar on ruz az [didori] Parvardigorason mahrumand
83|16|Va [ʙa'd az hisoʙ] musallaman voridi duzax mesavand
83|17|Ongoh ʙa eson gufta mesavad: «In [otas] hamon cizest, ki onro takziʙ mekarded»
83|18|Hargiz cunin nest [ki onho mepindorand]; ʙe gumon, nomai [a'moli] nakukoron dar «ilijjin» ast
83|19|Va tu ci doni, ki «ilijjin» cist
83|20|Kitoʙest, ki [a'moli ʙadkoron dar on] navista sudaast
83|21|Ki muqarraʙoni [dargohi ilohi] ʙar on hozir savand [va guvohi dihand]
83|22|Hamono nakukoron dar ne'mat [-hoi ʙihist] hastand
83|23|Bar taxtho [takja zada va] menigarand
83|24|Xurrami va nisoti ne'matro dar cehrahojason [meʙini va] mesinosi
83|25|Onho az saroʙi noʙi muhrsuda [nusonida va] seroʙ mesavand
83|26|Muhre, ki ʙar on nihodasuda az musk ast va dar in [saroʙ va digar ne'mathoi ʙihisti] mustoqon [-i rahmat] ʙojad ʙar jakdigar pesi girand
83|27|Va omezaas az tasnim ast
83|28|[Hamon] casmae, ki muqarraʙon [-i dargohi ilohi] az on menusand
83|29|Hamono kasone, ki curmu gunoh kardand, pajvasta [dar dunjo] ʙar kasone, ki imon ovarda ʙudand, mexandidand
83|30|Va har goh [mu'minon] az kanorason meguzastand, ʙo casmu aʙru ʙa ham isora mekardand [va ononro ʙa suxrija megiriftand]
83|31|Va cun ʙa suji xonavodai xud ʙozmegastand, [ʙa xotiri tamasxuri mu'minon] sodmonu xandon ʙudand
83|32|Va hangome ki mu'minonro medidand, meguftand: «Be gumon, inon gumrohonand»
83|33|Dar hole ki onon ʙaroi muroqiʙat [va nigahʙoni] ʙar mu'minon firistoda nasuda ʙudand
83|34|Vale imruz kasone, ki imon ovardaand, ʙa kofiron mexandand
83|35|Bar taxtho [-i orosta nisasta va ʙa ne'mathoi ilohi] menigarand
83|36|Ojo kofiron [ʙo casidani azoʙ] cazoi on ciro, ki mekardand, darjoft namudaand
84|1|On goh ki osmon sikofta savad
84|2|Va ʙa [farmoni] Parvardigoras gus faro dihad [va taslim savad]; va sazovor ast [ki cunin kunad]
84|3|Va on goh ki zamin gusturda [va hamvor] savad
84|4|Va har ciro daruni xud dorad, ʙerun rezad va tihi gardad
84|5|Va ʙa [farmoni] Parvardigoras gus faro dihad [va taslim savad]; va sazovor ast [ki cunin kunad]
84|6|Ej inson, ʙe gumon, tu dar rohi [rasidan ʙa] Parvardigorat saxt talosu kusis mekuni; pas, Uro muloqot xohi kard
84|7|Va ammo kase, ki noma [-i a'molas] ʙa dasti rostas doda savad
84|8|Ba zudi ʙa hisoʙe oson muhosiʙa mesavad
84|9|Va sodmon ʙa suji xonavodaas ʙozmegardad
84|10|Va ammo kase, ki nomai [a'molas] az pusti saras ʙa u doda savad
84|11|Pas, haloki xudro xohad talaʙid
84|12|Va ʙa [otasi] cahannami su'lavar xohad daromad
84|13|Be gumon, u dar [dunjo ʙa xotiri gunohonas] mijoni xonavodai xud sodmon ʙud
84|14|U gumon mekard, ki hargiz [ʙa nazdi Alloh taolo] ʙoznaxohad gast
84|15|Ore, hamono Parvardigoras az holi vaj ogoh ʙud
84|16|Pas, ʙa safaq savgand mexuram
84|17|Va savgand ʙa saʙ va on ciro furu mepusad
84|18|Va savgand ʙa moh cun [furuƣas] komil savad
84|19|Hatman, marotiʙu holoti muxtalifero jake pas az digare [dar masiri zindagii dunjavi] taj xohed kard
84|20|Pas, ononro ci suda, ki imon nameovarand
84|21|Va [caro] hangome ki Qur'on ʙar onon tilovat savad, sacda namekunand
84|22|Balki kasone, ki kofir sudand, pajvasta [ojoti ilohiro] takziʙ mekunand
84|23|Va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci dar dil pinhon medorand, donotar ast
84|24|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] ononro ʙa azoʙi dardnoke ʙasorat deh
84|25|Magar kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand, ki ʙaroi onon podose ʙeminnat va pajvasta ast
85|1|Savgand ʙa osmon, ki dorandai ʙurchost
85|2|Va savgand ʙa ruzi mav'ud [qijomat]
85|3|Va savgand ʙa har ki guvohi dihad va ʙa har ki mavridi guvohi qaror girad
85|4|Marg ʙar odamsuzoni xandaq
85|5|[Hamon otasi] Afruxta az hezumhoi ʙisjor [ki mu'minonro dar on mesuzondand]
85|6|hangome ki ʙar [kanorai] on nisasta ʙudand
85|7|Va on ciro ʙo mu'minon ancom medodand, tamoso mekardand
85|8|Va hec erode az onon nagiriftand, cuz in ki ʙa Allohi piruzmandi sutuda imon ovarda ʙudand
85|9|[Hamon] Kase, ki farmonravoii osmonho va zamin az oni Ust; va Alloh taolo ʙar hama ciz guvoh ast
85|10|Ba rosti, kasone, ki mardonu zanoni mu'minro sikanca [va ozor] dodand va pas [az ancomi on kor] tavʙa nakardand, pas, ʙaroi eson azoʙi cahannam [muhajjo] ast va azoʙi otas [dar pes dorand]
85|11|Hamono ʙaroi kasone, ki imon ovardand va korhoi soista kardand, ʙoƣhoe [az ʙihist] ast, ki cujʙorho zeri [daraxtoni] on cori ast; va in ast komjoʙii ʙuzurg
85|12|Be gumon, [mucozotu] saxtgirii Parvardigorat ʙisjor sadid ast
85|13|Dar haqiqat, Ust, ki [ofarinisro] oƣoz mekunad va duʙora [ʙa'd az marg] ʙozmegardonad
85|14|Va ham U omurzanda [va] dustor [-i mu'minon] ast
85|15|[U Alloh taolo] Sohiʙi Ars, [va] ʙalandmartaʙa [va sukuhmand] ast
85|16|[Va] On ciro ʙixohad, ancom medihad
85|17|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo dostoni laskarijon [-i haqsitez] ʙa tu rasidaast
85|18|[Laskari] Fir'avn va [qavmi] Samud
85|19|Balki kasone, ki kofir sudand, pajvasta dar takziʙ [-i haq] hastand
85|20|Va Alloh taolo az har su ʙar onon ihota dorad
85|21|Ore, in [ojot se'ru sehr nest, ʙalki] Qur'oni sukuhmand ast
85|22|Dar Lavhi mahfuz [az har guna tahrifu taʙdil dar amon] ast
86|1|Savgand ʙa osmon va savgand ʙa sitorai saʙgard
86|2|Va ci medoni, ki sitorai saʙgard cist
86|3|[Hamon] Sitorai furuzon ast
86|4|Hec kas nest magar on ki ʙar u nigahʙone [az faristagon gumosta suda] ast
86|5|Inson ʙojad ʙingarad, ki az ci ciz ofarida sudaast
86|6|Az jak oʙi cahanda ofarida sudaast
86|7|Ki az mijoni [ustuxoni] pust [-i mard] va sina [-i zan] ʙerun meojad
86|8|Be gumon, Alloh taolo ʙar ʙozgardondani u [pas az marg] tavonost
86|9|Ruze, ki rozho oskor gardad
86|10|[Dar on ruz] Inson hec tavonu jovare nadorad
86|11|Savgand ʙa osmoni purʙoron
86|12|Va savgand ʙa zamini pursikof [ki gijohon az on sar ʙarmeovarand]
86|13|Be gumon, in Qur'on suxani cudokunandai haq az ʙotil ast
86|14|Va [suxani] hazlu ʙehuda nest
86|15|Onon [kofiron] pajvasta hila va najrang mekunand
86|16|Va man [niz] hila [va tadʙir] mekunam
86|17|Pas, kofironro muhlat deh, [va] andake rahojason kun [to ƣarqi gunoh ʙosand]
87|1|Nomi Parvardigori ʙalandmartaʙaatro ʙa poki jod kun
87|2|[Hamon] ki [insonro] ofarid va hamohang va mutaodil soxt
87|3|Va [hamon] kase, ki andozagiri kard va [ʙa soistagi ofarid] va sipas hidojat namud
87|4|Va [on] kase, ki carogohro [ʙaroi taƣzijai condoron] rujonid
87|5|Sipas onro xusku sijoh gardonid
87|6|Mo ʙa zudi [Qur'onro] ʙar tu mexonem; pas, tu hargiz [onro] faromus naxohi kard
87|7|Magar on ciro, ki Alloh taolo ʙixohad; hamono U oskoru nihonro medonad
87|8|Va ʙaroi tu osontarin [roh]-ro faroham megardonem
87|9|Pas, agar pandi mufid ʙosad, [mardumro ʙo ojoti Qur'on] pand deh
87|10|Ba zudi, kase, ki [az Alloh taolo] metarsad, pand mepazirad
87|11|Va ʙadʙaxttarin [-i mardum] az on duri meguzinad
87|12|[Hamon] Kase, ki dar otasi ʙuzurg [-i cahannam] darxohad omad
87|13|Va dar on [otas] na memirad va na zinda memonad
87|14|Jaqinan, kase, ki xudro [az kufru gunoh] pok kunad, rastagor xohad sud
87|15|Va [niz kase, ki] nomi Parvardigorasro jod kunad va namoz ʙiguzorad
87|16|Vale sumo [mardum] zindagii dunjoro [ʙar oxirat] tarceh medihed
87|17|Dar hole ki oxirat ʙehtar va pojandatar ast
87|18|Ba rosti, in [pandho] dar kitoʙhoi osmonii pesin [niz] ʙud
87|19|Kitoʙhoi Iʙrohim va Muso
88|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo xaʙari qijomati havlnoki farogir ʙa tu rasidaast
88|2|Dar on ruz cehrahoe xoru zalil xohand ʙud
88|3|[Dar dunjo] Pajvasta talos karda [va] xasta suda [va cun dar rohi haq naʙuda, naticae nadidaand]
88|4|Dar otasi suzon darmeojand
88|5|Az casmai ʙisjor garm ʙa onho nusonda mesavand
88|6|Ƣizoe cuz xori xusku talx nadorand
88|7|Ki na [ononro] farʙeh kunad va na gurusnagiro daf' menamojad
88|8|Dar on ruz cehrahoe sodoʙu toza hastand
88|9|Va az sa'j [-ju talos]-i xud xusnudand
88|10|Dar ʙihisti ʙarin hastand
88|11|Dar on co hec suxani ʙehudae namesunavand
88|12|Dar on casma [-hoi oʙ] ravon ʙosad
88|13|Dar on taxthoi [zeʙoi] ʙaland [poja] ast
88|14|Va comhoe [ki dar kanori casmaho] nihoda suda
88|15|Va ʙolisthoi [munazzam] cidasuda
88|16|Va [niz] farshoi garonʙaho gusturda sudaast
88|17|Ojo [kofiron] ʙa sutur namenigarand, ki ci guna ofarida sudaast
88|18|Va ʙa osmon [namenigarand], ki ci guna ʙarafrosta sudaast
88|19|Va ʙa kuhho [namenigarand], ki ci guna [muhkam ʙar zamin] nasʙ sudaast
88|20|Va ʙa zamin [namenigarand], ki ci guna gusturda sudaast
88|21|Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] pand ʙideh, ki tu tanho panddihandai
88|22|Tu ʙar onon musallat [-u cira] nesti [ki ʙar imon vodorason kuni]
88|23|Ammo kase, ki ruj ʙigardonad va kofir savad
88|24|Sipas Alloh taolo uro ʙo ʙuzurgtarin azoʙ mucozot mekunad
88|25|Hamono ʙozgasti onho ʙa suji Most
88|26|Sipas ʙe gumon, hisoʙason [niz] ʙo Most
89|1|Savgand ʙa suʙh
89|2|Va ʙa saʙhoi dahgona [-i oƣozi zulhicca]
89|3|Va ʙa zavc va fard [-i asjo]
89|4|Va savgand ʙa saʙ, hangome ki [harakat mekunad va] meravad
89|5|Ojo dar in [cizho] savgande ʙaroi sohiʙxirad nest [ki uro qone' namojad]
89|6|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo nadidi, ki Parvardigorat ʙo [qavmi] Od ci kard
89|7|[Hamon qaʙilai] Iram, ki doroi [koxhoi ʙo] sutunhoi ʙaland ʙudand
89|8|Ki hammonandi on dar sahrho ofarida nasuda ʙud
89|9|Va [niz qavmi] Samud, onhoe, ki saxrahoi saxtro az [kanori] vodi metarosidand [va ʙaroi xud xona mesoxtand]
89|10|Va Fir'avn sohiʙi sipohi [ʙuzurg va qudratmand]
89|11|[Hamon] Kasone, ki dar sahrho tuƣjon [va sarkasi] kardand
89|12|Va dar onho fasodi ʙisjor ʙa ʙor ovardand
89|13|On goh Parvardigorat tozijonai azoʙro ʙar onon furud ovard
89|14|Jaqinan Parvardigori tu dar kamingoh ast
89|15|Va ammo inson hangome ki Parvardigoras uro ʙiozmojad va giromi dorad va ʙa u ne'mat ʙaxsad, [maƣrur megardad va] megujad: «Parvardigoram maro giromi dostaast»
89|16|Va ammo hangome ki uro ʙiozmojad va ruziasro ʙar u tang girad, [dilsard suda] megujad: «Parvardigoram maro xor kardaast»
89|17|Hargiz cunin nest [ki sumo mepindored]; ʙalki sumo jatimro giromi namedored
89|18|Va jakdigarro ʙar it'omi mustamandon tarƣiʙ namekuned
89|19|Va merosro harisona mexured [va haqqi zaifonro namedihed]
89|20|Va molu sarvat [-i dunjo]-ro ʙisjor dust medored
89|21|Hargiz cunin nest [ki sumo gumon mekuned]; hangome ki zamin saxt darham kuʙida savad [va hamvor gardad]
89|22|Va Parvardigorat [ʙaroi dodrasi] ʙijojad va [niz] faristagon saf dar saf [ʙiistand]
89|23|Va dar on ruz cahannam ovarda savad, dar on ruz insoni [kofir] pand megirad [va tavʙa mekunad]; va [ammo] in pand giriftan ci sude ʙarojas dorad
89|24|Vaj megujad: «Ej kos, [dar dunjo] ʙaroi [in] zindagiam [cize az] pes firistoda ʙudam
89|25|Pas, dar on ruz hec kas hammonandi azoʙi U [Alloh taolo] azoʙ namekunad
89|26|Va hec kas hamcun ʙand kasidani U [Alloh taolo] kasero ʙa ʙand namekasad
89|27|[Ammo ʙa mu'min nido mesavad] «Ej ruhi oromjofta
89|28|Ba suji Parvardigorat ʙozgard, dar hole ki tu [az podosi Alloh taolo] xusnudi va U az [a'moli] tu xusnud ast
89|29|Pas, dar zumrai ʙandagoni [xossi] Man daro
89|30|Va ʙa ʙihisti Man vorid sav»
90|1|Savgand ʙa in sahr [Makka]
90|2|Va tu dar in sahr sokini [va cang dar in sahr ʙaroi tu halol ast]
90|3|Va savgand ʙa padar [Odam] va farzandonas
90|4|Jaqinan, insonro dar ranc ofaridem
90|5|Ojo u gumon mekunad, hec kas ʙar [mucozoti] vaj tavono nest
90|6|Megujad: «[Ba xotiri infoq] Moli zijodero taʙoh kardaam»
90|7|Ojo mepindorad, ki hec kas uro nadidaast
90|8|Ojo ʙaroi u du casm qaror nadodem
90|9|Va jak zaʙon va du laʙ
90|10|Va uro ʙa du roh [xajr va sar] rohnamoi kardem
90|11|Pas, ʙa gardana [i saxt] qadam naguzost [va naomad]
90|12|Va tu ci medoni, ki gardana [-i saxt] cist
90|13|Ozod kardani ʙarda ast
90|14|It'om dar ruzi qahti [va gurusnagi]
90|15|[Xoh] Jatime az xesovandon [ʙosad]
90|16|Jo mustamande xoknisin
90|17|On goh az kasone ʙosad, ki imon ovardaand va jakdigarro ʙa saʙr [ʙar iʙodat va duri az gunoh] va mehruʙoni [ʙo ʙandagon] tavsija namudaand
90|18|Inon ahli saodatand [ki nomai a'mol ʙa dasti rostason doda mesavad va ahli ʙihistand]
90|19|Ammo kasone, ki ʙa ojoti Mo kufr varzidand, onon ahli saqovatand [ki nomai a'mol ʙa dasti capason doda mesavad va ʙa duzax meravand]
90|20|Bar onon [az har su] otasi sarpusidae ast [ki rohi firor nadorand]
91|1|Savgand ʙa xursed va ravsanii on [ʙa hangomi ʙomdod]
91|2|Va savgand ʙa moh, hangome ki ʙa'd az on ʙarojad
91|3|Va savgand ʙa ruz, hangome ki on [xursed]-ro ravsan [va cilvagar] kunad
91|4|Va savgand ʙa saʙ, hangome ki onro ʙipusonad
91|5|Va savgand ʙa osmon va ʙa on ki onro ʙino kard
91|6|Va savgand ʙa zamin va ʙa on ki onro gusturonid
91|7|Va savgand ʙa con [-i inson] va on ki onro [ofarid va] naku gardonid
91|8|Sipas nofarmoni va parhezgoriasro [ʙa u] ilhom kard
91|9|Be tardid, har ki nafsi xudro [az gunohon] pok kard, rastagor sud
91|10|Va har ki onro [ʙo gunoh] oluda soxt, jaqinan, zijonkor sud
91|11|[Qavmi] Samud az ruji sarkasi [pajomʙarasonro] takziʙ kardand
91|12|On goh ki ʙadkortarini eson [ʙaroi iqdom ʙa cinojat] ʙarxost
91|13|Pas, pajomʙari Alloh taolo [Soleh] ʙa onon guft: «Modasuturi Alloh taolo va [navʙati] oʙxurdanasro [hurmat nihed]»
91|14|[Vale onon] uro takziʙ kardand va on [modasutur]-ro kustand; pas, Parvardigorason ʙa saʙaʙi gunohonason ʙar sarason azoʙ ovard va hamagii ononro ʙo xok jakson kard
91|15|Va [Alloh taolo] az sarancomi on [kor] ʙim nadorad
92|1|Savgand ʙa saʙ, hangome ki [hama cizro] ʙipusonad
92|2|Va savgand ʙa ruz, hangome ki oskor savad
92|3|Va savgand ʙa on ki naru modaro ofarid
92|4|Ki, jaqinan, sa'j [-ju talos]-i sumo muxtalif [va neku ʙad] ast
92|5|Va ammo kase, ki [dar rohi Alloh taolo] ʙaxsid va parhezkori kard
92|6|Va [va'dai Alloh taolo va suxanoni] nekro tasdiq kard
92|7|Pas, Mo [ancomi a'moli naku va infoq dar rohi Allohro] ʙarojas oson mesozem
92|8|Va ammo kase, ki ʙuxl varzid va ʙenijozi talaʙid
92|9|Va [va'dai Alloh taolo va suxanoni] nekro takziʙ kard
92|10|Pas, Mo [ancomi a'moli sarru palidro] ʙarojas oson mesozem
92|11|Va dar hangom [-i margu] vurud ʙa duzax doroijas ʙa holi u sude naxohad dost
92|12|Musallaman, hidojat [-i ʙandagon] ʙar [uhdai] Most
92|13|Va qat'an oxirat va dunjo [niz] az oni Most
92|14|Pas, man sumoro az otase su'lavar ʙim dodam
92|15|Ki cuz ʙadʙaxttarin [-i mardum] dar on naaftad
92|16|[Hamon] Kase, ki [ojoti Moro] takziʙ kard va ru gardonid
92|17|Va ʙa zudi parhezkortarin [-i mardum] az on dur nigah dosta mesavad
92|18|[Hamon] Kase, ki moli xudro [dar rohi Alloh taolo] meʙaxsad, to [az gunoh] pok savad
92|19|Va hec kasro ʙa qasdi podos joftani ne'mat nameʙaxsad
92|20|Magar [ʙaroi] kasʙi rizo [va xusnudii] Parvardigori ʙartaras
92|21|Va ʙa rosti, ki [ʙo podosi Alloh taolo] xusnud xohad sud
93|1|Savgand ʙa oƣozi ruz
93|2|Va savgand ʙa saʙ, hangome ki orom girad
93|3|[Ki] Parvardigorat turo vo naguzosta va [ʙar tu] xasm nagiriftaast
93|4|Va musallaman oxirat ʙaroi tu az dunjo ʙehtar ast
93|5|Va ʙa zudi Parvardigorat ʙa tu [va ummati tu on qadr] ato xohad kard, ki xusnud gardi
93|6|Ojo turo jatim najoft, pas, panoh dod
93|7|Va turo [gumroh va] sargasta joft, pas, hidojat kard
93|8|Va turo faqir joft, pas, ʙenijoz namud
93|9|Pas, [tu niz] jatimro majozor
93|10|Va [mustamandi] nijozxohro maron [va ʙo u durusti makun]
93|11|Va ne'mathoi Parvardigoratro ʙozgu kun [va sipos guzor]
94|1|[Ej pajomʙar] Ojo Mo sinaatro [ʙaroi nuzuli vahj] ʙarojat nakusudem
94|2|Va sangini [-i ʙori gunoh va dusvorii risolat]-ro az [dusi] tu ʙarnadostem
94|3|Hamon [ʙore], ki ʙar pustat sangini mekard
94|4|Va [nomu] ovozai turo ʙaland soxtem
94|5|Pas, musallaman, ʙo [har] dusvori osoni ast
94|6|[Ore] Musallaman, ʙo [har] dusvori osoni ast
94|7|Pas, hangome ki [az koru umuri dunjo] foriƣ sudi, [ʙa iʙodati Parvardigorat] ʙikus
94|8|Va ʙa suji Parvardigorat roƣiʙ [va mustoq] sav
95|1|Savgand ʙa ancir va zajtun [va ʙa Falastin sarzamini ruisi onho]
95|2|Va savgand ʙa Turi Sino
95|3|Va savgand ʙa in sahri amn [Makka]
95|4|[Ki] Jaqinan, Mo insonro dar ʙehtarin surat [va ʙo fitrati pok] ofaridem
95|5|Sipas uro [ki inhirof joft] ʙa pasttarin [marohili] pasti ʙargardonidem
95|6|Magar kasone, ki imon ovardand va korhoi soista ancom dodand; pas, ʙaroi onon podose pojdor [dar pes] ast
95|7|Pas, [ej inson] ci cize ʙa'd [az in hama daloili ravsan] turo ʙa takziʙi [ruzi] cazo vo medorad
95|8|Ojo Alloh taolo ʙehtarin dovar [va hokimi mutlaq] nest
96|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Bixon ʙa nomi Parvardigorat, ki [hastiro] ofarid
96|2|[Hamon Parvardigore, ki] Insonro az xuni ʙasta ofarid
96|3|Bixon va Parvardigorat [az hama] ʙuzurgvoratr ast
96|4|[Hamon] Kase, ki ʙa vasilai qalam [navistan] omuxt
96|5|Ba inson on ciro, ki namedonist, omuxt
96|6|Cunin nest [ki sumo mepindored]; haqqo, ki inson tuƣjon [va sarkasi] mekunad
96|7|[Ba'd] Az in ki xudro ʙenijoz [va tavongar] ʙuʙinad
96|8|Jaqinan, ʙozgast [-i hama] ʙa suji Parvardigori tust
96|9|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo didai on kase, ki [az iʙodati Alloh taolo] ʙozmedorad
96|10|Bandaero, hangome ki namoz mexonad
96|11|Ba man xaʙar ʙideh, agar in [ʙanda] ʙar [rohi] hidojat ʙosad
96|12|[Mardumro] Ba parhezkori farmon dihad [pas, sazoi kase, ki cunin ʙandaero ʙijozorad cist]
96|13|Ba man xaʙar deh, agar in [saxsi sarkas haqro] takziʙ kard va rujgardon sud [ojo sazovori azoʙ nest]
96|14|Ojo namedonad, ki ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo [hama a'molasro] meʙinad
96|15|Cunin nest [ki u gumon mekunad]; agar ʙoz naojad [va dast az sarorat ʙarnadorad], hatman, muji pesoniasro ʙa saxti xohem girift [va ʙa suji duzax xohem kasonid]
96|16|Muji pesonii [hamon] duruƣgui xatokorro
96|17|Pas, ʙojad hammaclisonasro [ʙa kumak] ʙixonad
96|18|Mo [niz] otasʙononi [duzax]-ro faro xohem xond
96|19|Cunin nest [ki u mepindorad]; hargiz uro itoat makun va sacda kun va [ʙa Alloh taolo] taqarruʙ cuj
97|1|Hamono Mo on [Qur'on]-ro dar saʙi qadr nozil kardem
97|2|Va tu ci doni saʙi qadr cist
97|3|Saʙi qadr ʙehtar az hazor moh ast
97|4|Faristagon va Ruh [Caʙrail] dar on [saʙ] ʙa farmoni Parvardigorason ʙaroi [ancomi] har kore nozil mesavand
97|5|[On saʙ] To tului facr salomat [va rahmat] ʙosad
98|1|Kasone az ahli kitoʙ va musrikon, ki kofir sudand, [az oini kufr] dast ʙarnamedorand, to in ki ʙaroi onon daleli ravsane ʙijojad
98|2|Pajomʙare az sui Alloh taolo [ʙijojad], ki sahifahoi pokro ʙixonad
98|3|Va dar on [sahifaho] navistahoe ustuvor [va durust] ast
98|4|Va kasone, ki ʙa onon kitoʙ doda sud, [az cumlai jahudijon va masehijon] parokanda nasudand, [va ixtilof nakardand] magar ʙa'd az on ki daleli ravsan ʙaroi onon omad

98|5|Va eson farmon najoftand, cuz in ki Allohro ʙiparastand, dar hole ki dini xudro ʙaroi u xolis gardonand [va az sirku ʙutparasti] ʙa tavhid ru ovarand; va namoz ʙarpo dorand va zakot ʙipardozand; va in ast oini rostin va mustaqim
98|6|Be gumon, kasone az ahli kitoʙ va musrikon, ki kofir sudand, covidona dar otasi cahannam xohand mond. Onon ʙadtarin ofaridagon hastand
98|7|Hamono kasone, ki imon ovardand va korhoi soista ancom dodand, onon ʙehtarini ofaridagon hastand

98|8|Podosi eson nazdi Parvardigorason ʙoƣhoi [ʙihisti] covidon ast, ki cujʙorho az zeri [daraxtoni] on corist; hamesa dar on xohand mond; Alloh taolo az [a'moli] onho xusnud ast va onon [niz] az [podosi] U xusnudand; va in [maqom va podos] ʙaroi kasest, ki az Parvardigoras ʙitarsad
99|1|Hangome ki zamin ʙo sadidtarin takonhojas ʙa larza darojad
99|2|Va zamin ʙorhoi sanginasro ʙerun rezad
99|3|Va inson megujad: «On [zamin]-ro ci sudaast?»
99|4|Dar on ruz [zamin] tamomi xaʙarhojasro ʙozgu mekunad
99|5|Zero Parvardigorat ʙa u [cunin] vahj [va hukm] kardaast
99|6|Dar on ruz mardum guruh-guruh ʙozmegardand, to [naticai] a'molason ʙa onon nison doda savad
99|7|Pas, har kas ʙa andozai zarrae kori nek ancom doda ʙosad, [podosi] onro meʙinad
99|8|Va har kas ʙa andozai zarrae kori ʙad karda ʙosad, [kajfari] onro meʙinad
100|1|Savgand ʙa asphoi davanda, ki nafaszanon [ʙa suji majdoni cihod] pes meraftand
100|2|Va savgand ʙa asphoe, ki [ʙo ʙarxurdi sumhojason ʙa sangho] sarorai [otas] ecod kardand
100|3|Boz savgand ʙa asphoe, ki dar suʙhgohon [ʙar dusman] juris ʙarand
100|4|Pas, dar on hangom gardu ƣuʙor ʙarangezand
100|5|On goh ʙa mijoni [sipohi dusman] darojand
100|6|Jaqinan, inson dar ʙaroʙari [ne'mathoi] Parvardigoras ʙisjor nosipos ast
100|7|Va ʙe gumon, u ʙar in [nosiposi] guvoh ast
100|8|Va hamono u aloqai farovone ʙa mol [-i dunjo] dorad
100|9|Ojo u namedonad, ki dar on ruz on ci dar gurhost, [hama zinda va] ʙarangexta savand
100|10|Va on ci dar sinahost, [hama] oskor gardad
100|11|Jaqinan, dar on ruz Parvardigorason ʙa [vaz'u holi] eson komilan ogoh ast
101|1|[On] Furukuʙanda
101|2|[On] Furukuʙanda cist
101|3|Va tu ci doni, ki [on] furukuʙanda cist
101|4|Ruze, ki mardum monandi parvonahoi parokanda [hajronu sargardon] xohand ʙud
101|5|Va kuhho monandi pasmi rangini hallocisuda (zadasuda) xohand sud
101|6|Va ammo har kase, ki [dar on ruz] pallai mizonas sangin ʙosad
101|7|[Dar ʙihist] Dar zindagii rohatʙaxs xohad ʙud
101|8|Va ammo har kas, ki pallai mizonas saʙuk ʙosad
101|9|Pas, [maskanu] panohgohas «hovija» ast
101|10|Va tu ci doni, ki on [hovija] cist
101|11|Otase ast suzon [va su'lavar]
102|1|Zijodaxohi sumoro ʙa xud masƣul [va az jodi Parvardigor ƣofil] soxt
102|2|To [pojoni] koraton ʙa guriston rasid
102|3|Hargiz cunin nest [ki sumo mepindored]; ʙa zudi xohed donist
102|4|Boz [ham] cunin nest; ʙa zudi xohed donist
102|5|Cunin nest [ki sumo gumon mekuned]; agar ʙa donisi jaqini [va tardidnopazir haqiqati qijomatro] medonisted, [az zijodaxohi va iftixor ʙa amvolu farzandonaton dast ʙarmedosted]
102|6|Savgand, ki duzaxro xohed did
102|7|Boz ham savgand, ki onro ʙo casmi jaqin xohed did
102|8|On goh, hatman, dar ruzi qijomat az [tamomi] ne'matho ʙozxost xohed sud
103|1|Savgand ʙa asr
103|2|Ki inson dar zijon ast
103|3|Magar mu'minoni nakukore, ki jakdigarro ʙa haq suporis namudaand va ʙa sikeʙoi tavsija kardaand
104|1|Voj ʙar har ƣajʙatkunanda [va] ajʙcue
104|2|[Hamon] Kase, ki moli farovone gird ovard va onro sumoris kard
104|3|Gumon mekunad, ki molas uro covidona mesozad
104|4|Hargiz cunin nest [ki u gumon mekunad]; hatman, dar otasi darhamkuʙanda andoxta xohad sud
104|5|Va [ej Pajomʙar] tu ci medoni, ki otasi darhamkuʙanda cist
104|6|Otasi ʙarafruxtai ilohi ast
104|7|[Otase] Ki ʙar dilho cira megardad [va mesuzonad]
104|8|Be gumon, on [otas] ʙar onon furuʙasta [va az har su muhosirason karda] ast
104|9|[Afruxta] Dar sutunhoi ʙaland ast
105|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo nadidi Parvardigorat ʙo ashoʙi fil ci kard
105|2|Ojo [fireʙu] naqsai ononro dar taʙohi qaror nadod
105|3|Va parandagone guruh-guruh ʙar [sari] onon firistod
105|4|[Ki] Bo sanggil [ki dar minqoru cangol dostand] ononro sangʙoron mekardand
105|5|Pas, onhoro hamcun kohi cavidasuda soxt
106|1|Baroi [siposguzori az] hamʙastagi va unsi Qurajs
106|2|[Hamon] Hamʙastagi va unsi onon dar safarhoi zimistoni [ʙa Jaman] va toʙistoni [ʙa Som]
106|3|Bojad Parvardigori xonai Ka'ʙaro ʙiparastand
106|4|Hamon [Parvardigore], ki ononro az gurusnagi [rahonid, ʙa eson] xurok dod va az vahsatu tars emin namud
107|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo kase, ki ruzi cazoro duruƣ meangorad, didai
107|2|Pas u [hamon] kasest, ki jatimro [ʙo durusti az xud] meronad
107|3|Va [digaronro] ʙa it'omi tihidast tasviq namekunad
107|4|Pas, voj ʙar namozguzoron
107|5|Hamon kasone, ki az namozason ƣofiland
107|6|Kasone, ki xudnamoi mekunand
107|7|Va [az amonat dodani] vasoili zarurii zindagi dareƣ mevarzand
108|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ba rosti, ki Mo ʙa tu xajri ʙenihojat ato kardem
108|2|Pas, ʙaroi Parvardigorat namoz ʙixon va qurʙoni kun
108|3|Be tardid, dusmanat [az hamai xajrotu ʙarakot ʙeʙahra va] ʙurida ast
109|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ej kofiron
109|2|On ciro sumo meparasted, man nameparastam
109|3|Va on ciro, ki man meparastam, [niz] sumo nameparasted
109|4|Va na man parastisgari on ci sumo parastis kardaed, xoham ʙud
109|5|Va na sumo parastisgari on ci man meparastam, xohed ʙud
109|6|[Binoʙar in] Oini sumo ʙaroi xudaton va oini man ʙaroi xudam»
110|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Hangome ki jorii Alloh taolo va piruzi faro rasad
110|2|Va mardumro ʙuʙini, ki guruh-guruh dar dini Alloh taolo doxil mesavand
110|3|Pas, ʙa citoisi Parvardigorat tasʙeh guj va az U omurzis ʙixoh; hamono U ʙisjor tavʙapazir ast
111|1|Burida ʙod har du dasti Aʙulahaʙ va halok ʙod
111|2|Molu sarvatas va on ci ʙa dast ovarda ʙud, ʙa u sude naʙaxsid
111|3|Ba zudi ʙa otasi su'lavar xohad daromad
111|4|Va hamsaras [Ummi Camil, on] hezumkas [niz voridi otas mesavad]
111|5|Bar gardanas tanoʙe az lifi xurmost
112|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «U Alloh taolo jaktost
112|2|Alloh taolo ʙenijoz ast [va hama nijozmandi U hastand]
112|3|Na [farzande] zoda va na zoda sudaast
112|4|Va hec kas hammonandi va hamtoi U naʙuda va nest»
113|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ba Parvardigori sapedadam panoh meʙaram
113|2|Az sarri tamomi on ci ofaridaast
113|3|Va az sarri torikii saʙ on goh ki hama coro faro girad
113|4|Va az sar [-i zanoni codugar], ki ʙo afsun dar girehho medamand
113|5|Va az sarri hasud on goh ki hasad varzad»
114|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ba Parvardigori mardum panoh meʙaram
114|2|Farmonravoi mardum
114|3|Ma'ʙudi mardum
114|4|Az sarri [sajtoni] vasvasagar, ki [ʙa hangomi zikri Alloh taolo] pinhon megardad
114|5|Hamone, ki dar dilhoi mardum vasvasa mekunad
114|6|Az cinnijon [ʙosad] va [jo az] odamijon»
